plays.text: Penalty to Radek Martinek 2 minutes for Crosschecking Rob Ray
Penalty to Chris Osgood 2 minutes for Tripping Taylor Pyatt served by Brad Isbister
Penalty to Adrian Aucoin 2 minutes for High Sticking Stu Barnes
Penalty to Stu Barnes 2 minutes for Crosschecking Adrian Aucoin
Penalty to Roman Hamrlik 2 minutes for Interference Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Henrik Tallinder 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jason Blake
Penalty to Michael Peca 2 minutes for Roughing J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Taylor Pyatt 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Yashin
Penalty to Dmitri Kalinin 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Blake served by Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Adrian Aucoin 2 minutes for Holding Denis Hamel
Penalty to Curtis Brown 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Oleg Kvasha
Penalty to Roman Hamrlik 2 minutes for Hooking Stu Barnes
Penalty to Stu Barnes 2 minutes for Diving Roman Hamrlik
Penalty to Henrik Tallinder 2 minutes for Interference Michael Peca served by Jason Woolley
Penalty to Taylor Pyatt 2 minutes for Interference Radek Martinek
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Taylor Pyatt
Goal scored by Jason Blake assisted by Kenny Jonsson
